sentence.Network_en: His new play, Arcadia, is as intricate, elaborate and allusive as anything he has yet written.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的新剧《阿卡迪亚》和他写过的任何作品一样，错综复杂、构思精巧并且富含典故。

sentence.Network_en: In his fancy the Island seemed an unattainable Arcadia.
sentence.Network_cn: 在他的幻梦中,那岛屿似乎成了可望而不可及的阿卡狄亚了.

sentence.Network_en: Complete this section to highlight areas which falls outside the Arcadia Group Plc minimum standards.
sentence.Network_cn: 请完成此部分,并注明不能满足Arcadia最低要求之处.
